Name: project_budget_limit
Description: The total project cost must not exceed the allocated budget

Name: worker_availability_min
Description: Each worker's availability must be at least 70%

Name: team_has_scrum_master
Description: A team must have a Scrum Master assigned

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: The duration of a sprint is fixed and cannot be changed

Name: user_story_has_acceptance_criteria
Description: Every user story must have defined acceptance criteria

Name: blocker_must_be_resolved
Description: No task can be blocked by an unresolved critical blocker (severity>8)

Name: task_effort_positive
Description: The effort for any task must be a positive number

Name: feature_in_backlog
Description: A feature must be in the product backlog before being planned
